items.content_html: A lightweight web-based simulator for controlling a UAV using Python code. This app features a real-time 3D drone visualization, motor thrust plots, and a built-in code editor, allowing users to test flight logic directly in the browser. Ideal for testing drone dynamics, control systems, and autonomous flight.
items.title: Rakshan-VP/Quadcopter-sim: A lightweight web-based simulator for controlling a UAV using Python code. This app features a real-time 3D drone visualization, motor thrust plots, and a built-in code editor, allowing users to test flight logic directly in the browser. Ideal for testing drone dynamics, control systems, and autonomous flight.
